title: Monocle Systems Announces Participation at SAP TechEd 2015
text:
Monocle Systems Announces Its Participation at SAP® TechEd® to Showcase its Hosting Services for SAP S/4HANA and SAP Solution Manager
Media, PA (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Monocle Systems , an SAP partner, today announced that it will demonstrate its hosting service offerings for SAP® Business Suite 4 SAP HANA® (SAP S/4HANA) and SAP Solution Manager at the upcoming SAP TechEd® conference in booth #116. The SAP TechEd conference, being held Oct. 19-23 in Las Vegas, focuses on technology with an emphasis on collaboration and hands-on workshops, going beyond technical education.
“SAP TechEd offers a tremendous opportunity for us to promote to IT organizations the use of SAP’s latest technology applications, including SAP S/4HANA – the next-generation business suite – and its application lifecycle management toolset in SAP Solution Manager,” explained Jon Friesen, Chief Technologist of Monocle Systems. “We look forward to delivering the benefits of SAP S/4HANA and SAP Solution Manager to CIOs, project managers, SAP Basis managers and system administrators attending the conference.”
SAP S/4HANA is redefining how enterprise software can create value in a digital economy. It provides a cutting-edge digital core with a personalized user experience, helping customers reimagine their business with instant business insight. In addition, SAP Solution Manager has broad capabilities as the central hub for configuring and operating SAP solutions.
Monocle Systems facilitates the rapid deployment of systems using SAP S/4HANA, along with SAP Solution Manager, through Seamless Systems TM, its fully hosted offering for SAP systems. It combines the rapid provisioning of production instances running in SAP software with application management services (AMS) to accelerate projects and reduce capital and operating costs. “From contract signing to handing over a hosted system to developers during an implementation, we average one week–whether it be SAP Solution Manager, the SAP ERP application running on the SAP HANA platform or SAP S/4HANA,” Friesen added. “Seamless Systems is our delivery of comprehensive support and functionality at a flat, predictable rate.”
About Monocle Systems, LLC
Monocle Systems, a Run SAP partner, is dedicated to implementing, operating, and enhancing SAP Solution Manager. The company’s offerings are designed to accelerate projects and streamline IT processes with SAP Solution Manager, Basis managed services, and hosting using the Amazon Web Services platform. Its flagship service, Infinite FocusTM, is a fully hosted offering for SAP Solution Manager delivered in a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model. For further information, please visit http://www.MonocleSys.com/Infinite-Focus .
